[Don] He ain't gonna outdrink me.
translation.de: Er schafft nicht mehr als ich.

translation.en: All right. Here we go. One, two, three.
Damn. That was awesome. That was beautiful.
translation.de: Verflucht. Das war wunderbar. Das war schön.

translation.en: What'd you think?
It's good. I had trouble following the story of the song,
translation.de: Es ist gut. Ich hatte Probleme, dem Liedtext zu folgen,

translation.en: but it was good. It was good. [chuckles]
-How long you been playing for? -Two years.
Two years. Wow, I had no idea.
translation.de: Zwei Jahre. Ich hatte keine Ahnung.

translation.en: -[cell phone ringing] -Ah, hold up.
-It's Caroline. Dang. Hold on. -[Don chuckles]
-[Buck] Everything all right? -It's fine.
[Buck] Tell me about this girl you're dating.
-You go to the same school? -No. She's already in middle school.
translation.de: -Geht ihr in dieselbe Schule? -Sie ist schon in der Mittelschule.

translation.en: Oh, middle school. Uh-oh, look out. Jaden's got himself an older woman.
translation.de: Mittelschule. Aufgepasst. Jaden hat eine ältere Frau.

translation.en: No. Jaden got held back a year.
It's nothing to be ashamed of, right, son? It's all good.
translation.de: Dafür musst du dich nicht schämen.

translation.en: Did I tell you I got a girlfriend?
translation.de: Weißt du, dass ich eine Freundin habe?

translation.en: Yes, I do. Her name's Kimberly.
I got a photograph of her here.
There she is. Ninety-eight pounds.
I call her my little spinner. Wanna know why?
translation.de: Ich nenn sie meinen kleinen Kreisel.

translation.en: Why?
Because I set her up on the tip of my pecker
translation.de: Ich setze sie auf meine Schwanzspitze

translation.en: and spin her around like a spinning top.
All right, Don. That's enough. [laughing]
Oh, God, love her. [laughs]
After this trip, me and her are gonna visit her folks in Kentucky. Phew.
translation.de: Nach diesem Ausflug besuchen wir ihre Verwandten in Kentucky.

translation.en: They got it figured out. They got this beautiful land.
translation.de: Die machen's richtig mit diesem schönen Stück Land.

translation.en: Great big farm. All they do is sit around watching TV. [scoffs]
translation.de: Große Farm. Sie sitzen den ganzen Tag vor dem Fernseher.

translation.en: Don't they have a farm to run?
I guess. I ain't never seen them do it, though.
All I see them do is watch television.
translation.de: Ich sehe sie immer nur fernsehen.

translation.en: That is gangster.
Sounds kind of boring to me.
[chuckling] Me and Kimberly like it, so it's not that boring to me.
translation.de: Für mich und Kimberly ist das nicht langweilig.

translation.en: How about you, Dad? You got a girlfriend?
translation.de: Und du, Dad? Hast du eine Freundin?

translation.en: Who, Buck? The only tail your dad is chasing is whitetail.
translation.de: Wer, Buck? Dein Dad jagt nur Weißwedelhirsche.

translation.en: [Buck chuckles] Yeah. That's right.
Maybe you should start dating again.
No, no, no. I'm all right as is. I'm doing just fine.
Probably be good for you.
Seems like Mom is moving on. Her and Greg are talking about getting married.
translation.de: Wie Mom. Sie und Greg sprechen übers Heiraten.

translation.en: They're talking about what?
He hasn't officially asked her yet, but she knows it's coming.
translation.de: Er hat sie noch nicht gefragt, aber das kommt noch.

translation.en: They talk about it all the time.
Shoot. That's ridiculous.
The ink on the divorce is barely even dry.
[chuckles] It has been two years, Buck.
translation.de: Es ist zwei Jahre her, Buck.

translation.en: What are you, a human calendar?
Mr. Trapper Keeper? I know how long it's been.
translation.de: Protokollführer? Ich weiß, wie lang es her ist.

translation.en: God! Shoot. I hate selfish people!
[Jaden] I'll give it to him, though.
Greg told me some of his ideas for when he proposes.
translation.de: Greg hat mir gesagt, wie er den Antrag machen will.

translation.en: Man, that dude has a great imagination.
He was talking about all these crazy things like skydiving.
translation.de: Er redete von verrückten Sachen wie Skydiving.

translation.en: Where you going?
I'm gonna go take a leak.
Dang.
What were you thinking?
translation.de: Was hast du dir dabei gedacht?

translation.en: You know better than to pull a stunt like this.
translation.de: So etwas solltest du nicht machen.

translation.en: You could have hurt yourself.
Sorry. Dang!
What is going on in your mind?
I just wanted to ride and y'all were asleep.
translation.de: Ich wollte fahren, und ihr habt geschlafen.

translation.en: You realize I have to pay for that four-wheeler now?
-You realize how much they cost? -[sighs]
translation.de: Ist dir klar, was das kostet?

translation.en: [Buck] Why are you recording?
This isn't part of the narrative.
I figured it might make a good mid-point crisis--
translation.de: Ich dachte, das wäre eine gute Zuspitzung...

translation.en: Shut the camera off.
Trying to have a moment with my son. Remove yourself.
Yeah, okay.
[sighs] This sucks. If you let me drive, then we wouldn't be in this predicament.
translation.de: Würdest du mich fahren lassen, wäre das nicht passiert.

translation.en: You shouldn't have taken out the four-wheeler without permission.
translation.de: Du hast den Quad ohne Erlaubnis genommen.

translation.en: Fine. I'm the devil. I'm a terrible person.
translation.de: So, jetzt bin ich wieder der Böse.

translation.en: -Who are you calling? -Nobody.
Dang, I'm making a video for my vlog.
What's up? This is Jaden running around here,
translation.de: Was geht? Hier ist Jaden. Ich renne hier im Wald rum

translation.en: hunting in the woods with my dad.
Sucks.
Leave me some comments if you hate hunting, too.
translation.de: Bitte Kommentare, wenn ihr Jagen auch hasst.

translation.en: Give it.
What are you doing?
I told you one too many times to stay off the phone.
But that's my private property.
I'm keeping this until the end of the trip.
translation.de: Das behalte ich, bis wir fertig sind.

translation.en: For the next few days, you have to go without it.
translation.de: Die nächsten Tage muss es ohne gehen.

translation.en: What about Caroline?
The world isn't gonna end if you can't call your girlfriend for three days.
translation.de: Die Welt geht nicht unter, wenn du drei Tage nicht anrufst.

translation.en: But we're each other's support system.
The cell phone is mine. Topic closed.
You're ruining my life and you don't even care.
translation.de: Du zerstörst mein Leben, und es ist dir egal.

translation.en: Maybe I'm ruining your life 'cause you're being a damn idiot.
translation.de: Vielleicht, denn du bist ein Idiot.

translation.en: Don't call me an idiot!
-Okay. -Take it back.
I take it back. It's not like I meant it.
translation.de: Tu ich. Hab's nicht so gemeint.

translation.en: Let's forget about it.
Now what about that non-typical we saw yesterday?
translation.de: Was ist mit dem Außergewöhnlichen von gestern?

translation.en: How'd you like to bag that son of a gun, huh?
translation.de: Wie willst du den zur Strecke bringen?

translation.en: Come on, we're hunting. Let's have fun.
I can't stand you sometimes.
translation.de: Ich kann dich manchmal nicht leiden.

translation.en: [Buck] I see you peeking out from behind that tree.
translation.de: Ich seh dich hinter dem Baum.

translation.en: This is not going in the cut.
After experiencing some technical difficulties
with one of our four-wheelers,
we decided to go on foot.
Nothing was gonna keep Jaden and me from catching that monster non-typical.
translation.de: Jaden und ich wollten den Außergewöhnlichen unbedingt erlegen.

translation.en: When things don't go right, a true hunter straps on his boots and marches on.
translation.de: Wenn es Probleme gibt, ist ein echter Jäger in seinem Element.

translation.en: Just when we thought we'd lost the trail,
translation.de: Als wir dachten, die Spur sei verloren,

translation.en: I noticed a whole mess of tracks by the river.
translation.de: sah ich ganz viele Spuren am Fluss.

translation.en: This was a good sign.
It looked like a well-traveled doe trail, and like every hunter knows,
translation.de: Es sah nach Hirschkuhfährten aus, und, wie jeder Jäger weiß,

translation.en: where there's a doe, a buck is not far behind.
translation.de: kann dann auch ein Hirsch nicht weit sein.

translation.en: I showed Jaden how the doe trail followed up the river.
translation.de: Ich zeigte Jaden, wie die Spur am Fluss verlief.

translation.en: Our non-typical was leading us even deeper into the mountains,
translation.de: Unser Außergewöhnlicher führte uns tiefer in die Berge,

translation.en: miles away from human contact.
Almost as if it was calling us.
translation.de: Es war, als riefe er uns.

translation.en: Just like life, hunting comes with no guarantees.
translation.de: Die Jagd ist wie das Leben voller Überraschungen.

translation.en: But I don't usually have a problem finding the big deer,
translation.de: Ich habe sonst kein Problem, das Wild zu finden,

translation.en: especially with that old Sniper 2000 stuff I use.
That's what I'm talking about.
It's like he doesn't even care about catching this deer.
translation.de: Als wäre ihm das Wild egal.

translation.en: This trip was supposed to be a way for us to bond.
translation.de: Dieser Ausflug sollte unsere Bindung stärken.

translation.en: Yeah, well, it doesn't look like that's happening.
translation.de: Sieht nicht aus, als wäre es so.

translation.en: -Jesus, Don. -What? I'm agreeing with you.
translation.de: -Du liebe Güte. -Was? Ich bin derselben Meinung.

translation.en: It doesn't look like it's happening.
-Yeah, well, stop. -Okay. Copy that.
I was hoping to discuss something with you, if you don't mind.
translation.de: Ich wollte mit dir etwas besprechen.

translation.en: Yeah, what?
Well, I was thinking maybe after this trip I go ahead and take a little time off.
translation.de: Nach diesem Ausflug brauche ich eine Auszeit.

translation.en: What? Time off?
Yeah, you know, I told you about Kimberly's parents' farm.
translation.de: Ich erzählte dir von der Farm, die Kimberlys Eltern haben.

translation.en: We were thinking maybe going up there,
spend a little time, uh, hang out there. See how it fits us.
translation.de: ein bisschen abhängen. Sehen, wie's läuft.

translation.en: But we got Washington next month.
translation.de: Aber wir sind nächsten Monat in Washington.

translation.en: That's the thing. I was thinking maybe you go up alone and I sit this one out.
translation.de: Ich dachte, vielleicht gehst du alleine.

translation.en: But we gotta shoot Buck Ferguson Takes On the Great Northwest.
translation.de: Wir drehen "Buck Ferguson erobert den großen Nord-Westen".

translation.en: Well, Buck, to be honest,
Kimberly's getting sick of me leaving all the time.
translation.de: Kimberly hat es satt, dass ich nie da bin.

translation.en: She's throwing around the "R" word.
What's that word?
Retirement. She thinks I should be retiring.
I can't believe you're choosing now to bring this up.
translation.de: Nicht zu fassen, dass du das jetzt sagst.

translation.en: Don't you think I got enough to worry about with Jaden?
translation.de: Ich hab schon genug Sorgen mit Jaden.

translation.en: Yeah, of course I do. [chuckles]
Look, you and me have done things the world is gonna remember.
translation.de: Wir beide haben Dinge getan, die die Welt nie vergessen wird.

translation.en: I've done them, but you videotaped me doing them.
translation.de: Ich war es, aber du hast es auf Video aufgenommen.

translation.en: You wanna throw that all away?
No, Buck. I never said I want to throw them away. I...
translation.de: Nein, Buck. Ich will nichts wegwerfen. Ich...

translation.en: This isn't really that thought out of an idea.
translation.de: So habe ich das nicht gemeint.

translation.en: It was just something she was pushing on me.
I'm sorry, but I can't allow it.
Your dream of watching TV all day long is gonna have to wait.
translation.de: Dein Traum, den ganzen Tag fernzusehen, wird warten müssen.

translation.en: I need all hands on deck right now.
Yeah. No. Of course you do.
We're in the middle of it, so, yeah.
Maybe we can agree to discuss this at a later date.
translation.de: Vielleicht können wir das später besprechen.

translation.en: -How about that? -Yeah. I don't know, Don.
Maybe in a year or so. But probably not.
[chuckles] Sounds good. Just forget I even said anything about it.
translation.de: Klingt gut. Vergiss, dass ich das erwähnt habe.

translation.en: [Don] Hey, look what I found.
translation.de: Sieh mal, was ich gefunden habe.

translation.en: Keep moving.
Be careful. You're gonna hurt yourself.
translation.de: Pass auf, du wirst dir wehtun.

translation.en: I'm not. I'm trained for this. Greg set me up with parkour lessons.
translation.de: Dafür bin ich ausgebildet. Greg zahlt mir Parcours-Training.

translation.en: I thought you were taking karate. We agreed on karate.
It was too hard, so I quit.
Well, it takes time to learn something, son.
translation.de: Es dauert, bis man etwas lernt, Sohn.

translation.en: You can't just go around quitting stuff 'cause it's hard.
translation.de: Man kann nicht einfach alles hinschmeißen.

translation.en: [Jaden] That's not what Greg says.
Greg says if you don't like doing something,
translation.de: Er sagt, wenn du was ungern tust,

translation.en: there ain't no reason to do it. And it's totally cool to quit.
translation.de: lass es sein. Es ist in Ordnung, aufzuhören.

translation.en: Well, that's a terrible lesson. No wonder you got held back.
translation.de: Schreckliche Lektion. Kein Wunder, dass du sitzenbliebst.

translation.en: Greg says it was the teacher's fault.
translation.de: Greg sagt, der Lehrer war schuld.

translation.en: Greg's only telling you what you wanna hear
translation.de: Greg sagt, was du hören willst,

translation.en: because he wants to suck up and not hurt your feelings.
Trust me when I tell you that when you get a little older,
translation.de: Glaub mir, wenn du etwas älter bist,

translation.en: you won't think gymnastics are cool anymore.
translation.de: findest du Turnen nicht mehr cool.

translation.en: I told you, it's not gymnastics, it's parkour--
translation.de: Ich sagte doch, nicht Turnen, es ist Parcours...

translation.en: Oh, you're okay.
No, I'm not. My leg's getting ready to seize up on me.
translation.de: Nein, mein Bein will nicht mehr.

translation.en: That's why I told you stop playing around on the rocks. Get up.
translation.de: Deshalb sagte ich, hüpf nicht auf den Felsen rum.

translation.en: Let me catch my breath for a second.
-Is your leg hurting or are you tired? -Both. Dang.
translation.de: -Tut dein Bein weh oder bist du müde? -Beides. Verflixt.

translation.en: Okay, we lost the whole morning already.
translation.de: Ok, wir haben den Morgen vertrödelt.

translation.en: -Daylight's burning here. -But, Dad, my leg's fixing to die.
translation.de: -Es ist nicht ewig hell. -Aber mein Fuß stirbt ab.

translation.en: [Don] Oh, you shit bird!
[Buck] You all right, Don?
[sighs] I slipped on this damn rock and hit my darn head.
Maybe it is a good time to stop for lunch.
Yeah, let's make camp. Sounds like a good idea.
translation.de: Ja, schlagen wir ein Lager auf.

translation.en: Good, 'cause my blood sugar's running low.
Oh, shit, am I bleeding?
Hey, Jaden, where's your daddy?
translation.de: Hi, Jaden, wo ist dein Daddy?

translation.en: -Making sandwiches. -You ain't hungry?
I am hungry. But I'm gonna put my hunger pangs into my music.
translation.de: Doch, aber meine Hungerqualen verarbeite ich in meiner Musik.

translation.en: Oh, uh-oh. What's wrong?
I could tell you, but you would never understand.
Oh, you might be surprised what old Don understands.
translation.de: Du wärst überrascht, was der alte Don versteht.

translation.en: -[lighter clicks] -You smoke?
Hell, yeah, I do. Don't tell your dad, though.
translation.de: Ja, aber sag's nicht deinem Dad.

translation.en: Thinks it scares away the deer.
translation.de: Er glaubt, das vertreibt das Wild.

translation.en: Can I get a toke?
There you go, Biggin.
I wish my dad was more chill like you.
translation.de: Wär bloß mein Dad so cool wie du.

translation.en: Your dad is definitely not the easiest fella to get along with.
translation.de: Dein Dad ist ein schwieriger Mensch.

translation.en: He does put a lot of pressure on himself.
translation.de: Er macht sich selbst viel Druck.

translation.en: I think that's his drive to become the world's best hunter.
translation.de: Ich denke, er will weltbester Jäger werden.

translation.en: I can remember the first video I made with your dad.
translation.de: Ich erinnere mich an das erste Video, das ich mit deinem Dad machte.

translation.en: We were up in Michigan, and I was not prepared for the weather.
translation.de: Wir waren in Michigan, das Wetter traf mich unvorbereitet.

translation.en: That first day it had snowed ten inches and I'd forgotten my waterproof boots.
translation.de: Es hatte 25 cm geschneit und ich hatte meine Schneestiefel vergessen.

translation.en: I turned to your dad and said,
"Please, Buck, let's turn back. Let's go home. Let's get out of here."
translation.de: "Bitte, Buck, lass uns umdrehen. Gehen wir heim. Weg hier."

translation.en: But he wasn't hearing it.
He sat me down. He was like,
"Don, do you know what kind of pressure I'm under? Do you?
translation.de: "Weißt du, unter welchem Druck ich stehe?

translation.en: Every single person thinks
that Buck Ferguson gets his deer every single time,
translation.de: Buck Ferguson schießt sein Wild auf Anhieb,

translation.en: and I won't turn back until I do."
translation.de: und ich geh erst, wenn es stimmt."

translation.en: -What'd you do? -What do you think I did?
Sucked it up.
We stayed out there for another three days and damn if your dad wasn't right.
translation.de: Wir blieben noch drei Tage und verflucht, dein Dad hatte recht.

translation.en: He caught himself a nice 12 pointer,
and we made one of the best videos we've ever made.
translation.de: und wir machten eines unserer besten Videos.

translation.en: What about your feet?
I lost my big toe to frostbite.
translation.de: Der große Zeh ist mir erfroren.

translation.en: You lost a toe?
Yes, I did. Yep.
Got a little bit of a balance issue because of it.
translation.de: Deshalb komme ich leicht aus dem Gleichgewicht.

translation.en: That's not really the takeaway.
translation.de: Aber das ist nicht der Punkt.

translation.en: The point of the story is your dad is under a lot of pressure.
translation.de: Dein Dad steht unter großem Druck.

translation.en: You can understand being under pressure, right?
I guess.
Don, why does my dad hate me?
translation.de: Don, wieso hasst mich mein Dad?

translation.en: Hate you?
Oh, come on. You don't believe that.
translation.de: Das glaubst du doch selbst nicht.

translation.en: Your dad is tough to get along with, but he loves you.
translation.de: Dein Dad ist schwierig im Umgang, aber er liebt dich.

translation.en: These last two years have just been tough on him.
translation.de: Diese letzten zwei Jahre waren schwer.

translation.en: That divorce did a real number on his head.
translation.de: Die Scheidung war schwer für ihn.

translation.en: I think he believes this trip is gonna somehow fix it.
translation.de: Er denkt wohl, dieser Ausflug macht alles wieder gut.

translation.en: Well, I wish he'd care less about me killing a deer
translation.de: Wäre es ihm bloß nicht so wichtig, dass ich einen Hirsch schieße,

translation.en: and more about giving me back my dang phone.
translation.de: und würde er mir stattdessen mein Handy geben.

translation.en: Caroline's probably worried sick.
I can relate to that.
If I don't call Kimberly every now and then,
translation.de: Würde ich Kimberly nicht ab und zu anrufen,

translation.en: she definitely puts my ass in the damn doghouse. [chuckles]
I wish there was some way I could let her know I'm okay.
translation.de: Ich wünschte, ich könnte ihr sagen, mir geht es gut.

translation.en: That's all I want for her right now.
-You ready, buddy? -[Jaden] I'm ready.
-Are you filming? Is it rolling? -Yeah.
Here we go. Hoverboard city.
-[Jaden] Don't be scared. -I ain't scared.
Just don't wanna break my neck. Thanks for the ride, buddy!
translation.de: Ich will mir nur nicht das Kreuz brechen. Danke für die Fahrt!

translation.en: Hey, Buck, what you doing? What you up to?
translation.de: He, Buck, was hast du vor?

translation.en: Just looking for the shortest course to the top of this mountain.
translation.de: Ich such nur den kürzesten Weg zur Bergspitze.

translation.en: Oh, that's great.
Lunch is gonna get cold. Where's Jaden?
translation.de: Das Essen wird kalt. Wo ist Jaden?

translation.en: Don, look at me. Where's my son?
translation.de: Don, sieh mich an. Wo ist mein Sohn?

translation.en: [clears throat] He's, uh, talking with his girlfriend.
No, he's not. I took his phone away.
translation.de: Nein. Ich habe das Handy beschlagnahmt.

translation.en: I let him borrow mine. So he's...
-You did what? -I let him borrow my phone.
translation.de: -Was hast du? -Ich lieh ihm mein Telefon.

translation.en: It was the right thing to do. He really wanted to speak with her.
translation.de: Es war richtig Er wollte wirklich mit ihr reden.

translation.en: I took that away from him so he'd focus on this trip.
translation.de: Ich nahm es ihm ab, damit er sich konzentriert.

translation.en: How could you do that?
I guess I'm just a believer in true love.
translation.de: Ich glaube wohl an wahre Liebe.

translation.en: He is really torn up about this girl and I didn't think it was right--
translation.de: Er ist echt traurig wegen dem Mädchen, und es war falsch...

translation.en: Don! Stop it! I'm his father.
translation.de: Don! Hör auf, ich bin sein Vater.

translation.en: I know what's best for him, and I'd take it kindly
translation.de: Ich weiß, was für ihn das Beste ist,

translation.en: if you would not undercut my authority again.
Copy that.
Nothing is going the way it's supposed to.
translation.de: Nichts klappt so, wie es soll.

translation.en: I cooked this nice meal.
translation.de: Ich habe dieses gute Essen gekocht.

translation.en: The whole thing's gonna go to waste, just like this trip.
translation.de: Das alles ist umsonst, wie dieser Ausflug.

translation.en: And now, I get to go be the bad guy again.
translation.de: Und jetzt bin ich wieder der Böse.

translation.en: Thanks a lot, Don.
What did I tell you, son?
No phone calls until after this trip and you disobeyed me.
translation.de: Keine Anrufe bis nach dem Ausflug, und du hast nicht gehorcht.

translation.en: What do you have to say for yourself?
Caroline broke up with me.
translation.de: Caroline hat mit mir Schluss gemacht.

translation.en: What happened?
She went to this middle school dance,
which everyone knows is a recipe for disaster.
translation.de: jeder weiß, das bedeutet nichts Gutes.

translation.en: Now she says she doesn't want to date someone in elementary school.
translation.de: Jetzt will sie angeblich keinen aus der Grundschule.

translation.en: That's ridiculous. You two are the same age.
That's what I told her.
Well, are you doing okay?
I'm fine. She's the one being stupid.
translation.de: Ja. Sie ist diejenige, die dumm ist.

translation.en: She's being so dumb right now I can barely stand it.
translation.de: Sie ist gerade so blöd, das halt ich nicht aus.

translation.en: I hate being in elementary school.
Look, Jaden...
I know you like this girl, but let me tell you something.
translation.de: Ich weiß, du magst das Mädchen, aber ich sag dir was.

translation.en: There is nothing wrong with you.
translation.de: Mit dir ist alles in Ordnung.

translation.en: If Caroline or whatever her name is
translation.de: Wenn Caroline, oder wie sie heißt,

translation.en: can't appreciate you for who you are, then she does not deserve you.
translation.de: dich nicht schätzt, verdient sie dich nicht.

translation.en: Is that why you and Mom got a divorce?
translation.de: Habt ihr euch deshalb scheiden lassen?

translation.en: Yeah. There were some other things.
It started in '09.
DVD sales were down slightly.
translation.de: Die DVDs verkauften sich nicht mehr gut.

translation.en: Your mom was proving through this whole thing
to be a terribly selfish woman.
She just had to give up her lavish lifestyle,
translation.de: Sie musste ihren verschwenderischen Lebensstil aufgeben,

translation.en: trips to the mall, that sort of thing, and then she just went crazy.
translation.de: Einkaufsbummel, solche Sachen, und dann drehte sie durch.

translation.en: Just started acting out.
Around that time, Greg just kind of weaseled his way in
and basically stole my family out from me.
translation.de: in unsere Familie und stahl sie mir.

translation.en: It's funny hearing both sides.
translation.de: Es ist lustig, beide Seiten zu hören.

translation.en: Why? How do you mean?
Mom said that you were always out hunting.
translation.de: Mom sagte, du warst ständig jagen.

translation.en: And when you weren't hunting, you'd sit around drinking.
translation.de: Wenn nicht, saßt du rum und trankst.

translation.en: Kinda checked out, like.
She said whenever she tried to discuss it,
translation.de: Sie sagte, wenn sie darüber reden wollte,

translation.en: you'd shut her down and leave her no choice but to leave.
translation.de: sagtest du, sie soll still sein. Darum habe sie gehen müssen.

translation.en: She said that?
She also said that it was the hardest thing she ever had to do.
translation.de: Sie sagte, es war das Schwierigste, was sie je tun musste.

translation.en: You know why I love hunting?
translation.de: Weißt du, warum ich die Jagd liebe?

translation.en: Because when you're out in these woods, there's nothing to disturb you.
translation.de: Weil einen draußen im Wald keiner stört.

translation.en: Back home, the outside world has a way of just barging in on your life
translation.de: Daheim kann man die Außenwelt nicht vergessen,

translation.en: and just screwing everything up.
It makes a man feel powerless.
translation.de: So fühlt sich ein Mann machtlos.

translation.en: But out here, all your cares just kind of melt away.
translation.de: Aber hier draußen verfliegen alle Sorgen.

translation.en: When you find a deer,
and you bear down on that deer with your rifle,
translation.de: und es mit deinem Gewehr bezwingst,

translation.en: and you fulfill your rightful place in nature for one moment,
translation.de: und den dir zustehenden Platz in der Natur einnimmst,

translation.en: that power is restored.
Everything just falls into place.
I could sure use that right about now.
Oh, your time is coming, son.
translation.de: Deine Zeit kommt schon noch, Sohn.

translation.en: When you take that monster buck we've been tracking,
everything will make sense, I promise.
translation.de: wird alles Sinn machen, ich verspreche es.

translation.en: I wish I didn't have to wait,
translation.de: Ich wünschte, ich müsste nicht warten,

translation.en: 'cause I'm carrying a lot of stress, especially in my back.
translation.de: denn ich habe viel Stress, besonders mit dem Rücken.

translation.en: Come with me, son. Grab that ax.
translation.de: Komm mit mir, Sohn. Nimm diese Axt.

translation.en: [Buck] Whoa! Look at this.
[Buck] This rope bridge will save us time for sure.
translation.de: Diese Seilbrücke wird den Weg abkürzen.

-[Buck] Here we go. -[Don] There you go.

Just make myself feel better.
-Long way down, Buck. [chuckles] -Yeah.
[Don] We good?
-You got me? -Yeah.
-I'm on the edge of frame? -Got you framed up.

-[chuckles] -Whoo! Here we go.
All right.
-You all right? -You got it. Yeah.
-Here we go. -[Don] Here we go.
You know what I'm thinking, Don?

translation.en: -Uh, how am I supposed to get-- -No.
You know what I'm talking about?
Capturing the emotion on my face better?
Yeah, no, I understand.
-You want me to cross the bridge first... -Yeah.

translation.en: -because it's unsafe. -Exactly.
Be able to cover my face better.
I do think a zoom would also be nice, though--
translation.de: Ich glaube, ein Zoom wäre auch schön...

translation.en: The zoom would be great from the other side of the bridge.
translation.de: Der Zoom wäre von der anderen Seite der Brücke toll.

translation.en: To do that but also to follow the push, your back, see you hit the other side.
translation.de: Das, aber auch deinen Rücken zu zeigen, wie du am andern Ende ankommst.

translation.en: From the other side, though, it would be more the narrative simplicity.
translation.de: Von der anderen Seite wäre es erzählerisch einfacher.

translation.en: Zoom on me. You bring me in. We sell a lot of videos.

translation.en: Yeah. Hey, number one.
We're going for the best shots. Best video we've ever made.

Lights, camera, action. [laughs]
[Buck] Here you go.
-Jesus Christ. -[Buck] You good? You ready?

Come on, buddy. There you go. There you go!
Holy shit.

You're looking good. You're doing all right.
-Okay. -Doing good, Don.
[Don] Okay. Got it.
Oh, God damn it.
Oh, my God.
You look so funny. You're cracking us up.

-Don, you got this. -[Don] Oh, my God.
Holy shit. Oh!
Shakier than a damn Studebaker.
-Steady. -[Buck] You loving this, right?
Buck, you're gonna have a blast out here, you son of a bitch.

-[laughing] -[Buck] You're all right.
-Okay, okay. -[Buck] You got it, buddy.
[Don] Oh, Jesus Christ.
-Oh, my Jesus H. -He's moving good.
-Oh, he made it! There we go. -[Jaden] Whoo! Yeah!
-Good job. -Good job, Don.
He did a good job. He focused.

Nice job, Uncle Don. Nice job.
I'm very grateful. You rolling?
You were right!
It is a pretty good angle. We're rolling.
All right, son. Wait here while I test the integrity of that rope bridge.

[Don] All right, buddy, here we go.
Whoa! It's a long way down.
-[Jaden] It'll be all right! You got this! -[Don] Oh, yeah.

Good thing no one else has crossed that one before.

translation.en: Oh, this is exhilarating!
Show off.
[Buck] I'm coming for you, non-typical!
-Success! -Here you are.
That was awesome.
What's he doing?
Check it out. Zip line!
Jaden Ferguson, put that belt back on right now and cross it normal.

translation.en: That is a direct order. Over.
This is gonna be a rush.
Jaden, no!
No, no, no!
Oh, shit.
Come on. Keep going. Keep going.
Come on. Come on. Come on.
-Help! -God dang it.
-Oh, Jesus. -Dad! Help me!
Hold on, son! Don't let go!
-Help! -[Buck] I'm coming!
[Jaden] Dad! Help!
Hold on! Hold on, Jaden.
-[Jaden] I'm slipping! -I'm coming!
-Please, Dad! -Hold on.
Please help!
-Dad, I'm slipping! -Hold on!
-I'm slipping! -Son, hold on tight!
-Hold on! -Hold on, Jaden!
-[screaming] -No! No! No! Don't let go!
Almost there.
-Help! Hurry! -Almost there!
-[Jaden panting] -I got you, son. I got you.
I'm just glad you're safe.
translation.de: Nur gut, dass du in Sicherheit bist.

translation.en: Do you know how much you mean to me?
translation.de: Weißt du, wie viel du mir bedeutest?

translation.en: I'm not even mad that you did something so dumb and so stupid.

translation.en: Thanks, Dad.
Plus, you gotta admit, it's pretty nice just to chill here for a little bit.
translation.de: Und du musst zugeben, es ist schön, hier ein bisschen zu chillen.

translation.en: Are you still reading this article?
translation.de: Liest du immer noch diesen Artikel?

translation.en: -No. -No.
-But I was still looking at the pictures. -Oh, sorry.
translation.de: -Aber ich seh mir die Bilder an. -Tut mir leid.

translation.en: It's nice we got this time to talk.
I want to tell you that I know you're going through a lot of stuff
translation.de: Ich weiß, du hast viel mitgemacht

translation.en: and dealing with the divorce.
And now Greg's moved in and he's talking about marrying your mom.
translation.de: Und jetzt ist Greg eingezogen und will deine Mom heiraten.

translation.en: It's gotta be feeling weird.
translation.de: Das ist sicher seltsam für dich.

translation.en: Yeah. Mom was saying the same thing.
The other night, Mom and Greg sat me down at the table
translation.de: Neulich redeten Mom und Greg mit mir

translation.en: and said if they ever get married,
translation.de: und sagten, sollten sie je heiraten,

translation.en: I might feel weird what to call Greg.
translation.de: wüsste ich nicht, wie ich Greg nennen soll.

translation.en: She said I can either choose to call him Greg
translation.de: Sie sagte, ich darf ihn Greg nennen

translation.en: or I can choose to call him Dad.
-Uh-huh. What'd you say? -I said I didn't want to do it.
translation.de: -Was hast du gesagt? -Ich sagte, will ich nicht.

translation.en: -I thought it was strange. -It's very strange.
translation.de: -Ich fand es komisch. -Es ist sehr komisch.

translation.en: -Good for you, son. -Then you know what?
I tried it and it wasn't that bad.
translation.de: Ich versuchte es, und es war gar nicht übel.

translation.en: What? You called Greg "Dad"?

translation.en: Yeah, but only, like, five times.
I figured that if they ever get married, I might just switch back and forth.

translation.en: How could you do that, Jaden?

translation.en: What's the big deal? It doesn't mean anything.
Yes, it does, Jaden. It means a lot.
Where are you going?
I'm gonna look for that deer.
-Where are you going? -Gonna go track that non-typical.
-You all right, buddy? -I'm fine.
We don't find that non-typical, Jaden's never gonna shoot a deer,

No. You stay with Jaden. I want to be alone.

[Linda] Jaden? How you doing, sweetie?
No, it's not Jaden. It's Buck.
Buck? I can barely hear you.

translation.en: Is Jaden okay?
Oh, Jaden's fine. Everybody's fine. That's not why I'm calling.

translation.en: Buck, have you been drinking?
A little. I'm not drunk.

translation.en: We talked about you calling when you're drunk.
translation.de: Du sollst nicht anrufen, wenn du trinkst.

translation.en: That's not important. I got a bone to pick with you.
translation.de: Unwichtig. Ich hab mit dir ein Hühnchen zu rupfen.

translation.de: Was höre ich da, Jaden darf Greg "Dad" nennen?

translation.en: Look, let me just say, that is never gonna happen, Linda.
translation.de: Ich sage nur, das wird nie passieren, Linda.

translation.en: We may not be a family, but I'm still the boy's father.
translation.de: Wir sind keine Familie, aber ich bin trotzdem sein Vater.

translation.en: I have a say in this,
and there is no way I'm ever gonna let my son call another man "Dad."
translation.de: und ich werde nie zulassen, dass er jemand anders "Dad" nennt.

translation.en: Okay? Not now, not ever.
-I have to go, Buck. -No, wait, Linda! Linda, wait.
Are you really going to marry this guy?

translation.en: -Huh? -I have to go, Buck.
Linda? Hello?
Damn! Shit.
[Jaden] I hate the new Camaro. It's ugly.

translation.en: I bet you get a lot of pretty girls wanting to get a ride in that, though.

My ex thought a Honda Accord was a good car.

translation.en: She's a certified mechanic and a registered nurse.

translation.en: -That's pretty cool. -It is cool.
First time I met her, she's like, "I'm a certified mechanic and registered nurse."
translation.de: Beim Kennenlernen sagte sie: "Ich bin Mechanikerin und Pflegerin."

translation.en: I'm like, "Yeah? I got a busted truck and a heart condition."
translation.de: Ich sagte: "Ich hab 'ne Schrottkarre und Herzprobleme."

translation.en: Then she looks at me and she's like, "We're gonna get along just fine."
translation.de: Da sah sie mich an: "Wir werden gut miteinander auskommen."

translation.en: She's quick. She's a very funny woman.
translation.de: Sie ist schnell, eine sehr witzige Frau.

Bet I didn't show you that picture, huh?

That's just her thing. She's just into black fellas. She's wild.

Yeah, no, I took these photos. Look at this one here. See?

translation.en: -[Buck] What on God's green Earth? -Hey, Buck.
What are y'all looking at?
Uh, these, nothing, just the... These are the photos of Kimberly.
[chuckles] You know the ones. You've seen them. Look out.
I know what photos you're talking about.
-Leave, Don, right now! -Of course.
-Please and thank you. -All right. See you, Jaden.
You tell me what was happening, Jaden Ferguson.

translation.en: Those are adult images you have no business looking at.
I thought you brought me on this trip because I'm mature now.

translation.en: -Mellow out! -He...
Oh, that dirty son of a bitch!
Goddamn Greg. Goddamn Greg!
Okay. Buck, that was on me, okay?

translation.en: [chuckles] You've known me for 25 years. I respect women.

that thinks letting his lady do an orgy is respectful.

-Peccadilloes? [sighs] -Yeah.
What are you saying? I'm nasty?

translation.en: Oh, have I?
You wanna know the real reason I'm retiring?
translation.de: Soll ich dir sagen, wieso ich aufhöre?

translation.en: Oh, please, don't tell me about your stupid dream of watching TV.

translation.en: No, it has nothing to do with television.

translation.en: The real reason is because you're an asshole,

translation.en: and I'm sick of traipsing around these forests for nothing!

translation.en: To lose a goddamn big toe, that's all.

translation.en: [scoffs] You can talk all the nonsense
and Billy Bob bullshit you want about me and Kimberly's relationship,

translation.en: but the bottom line is, at least I got somebody.
At least I'm not alone in this world.
[groaning] Goddamn. Fuck.
You broke my nose.
translation.de: Du hast mir die Nase gebrochen

translation.en: You damned broke my nose and smashed it to the side of my face.
-Is it broken? -Get your hands off me! I'm done.
That's it. I'm sick and tired of the mistreatment,
translation.de: Das war's. Ich hab genug von deinen Misshandlungen,

translation.en: disrespect and condescension. I'm not dealing with it anymore.
translation.de: deiner Respektlosigkeit und Arroganz. Es reicht.

translation.en: You know what? You can take this hunting video and stick it up inside your asshole.

translation.en: Good luck taking that gear out of here by yourself!

translation.en: Twenty miles from the nearest road? Good luck.

translation.en: [Buck] Cars, cars and more cars.
Crowds, pollution, global warming.
These are all things our modern civilization creates.
translation.de: All diese Dinge erzeugt die moderne Zivilisation.

translation.en: Cities full of people caught up in the hustle and bustle of the rat race.
translation.de: Städte voll Menschen, gefangen in der Hektik des Hamsterrads.

translation.en: As you can probably tell, I'm not a big fan of city life.
translation.de: Ihr merkt schon, ich bin kein Freund des Stadtlebens.

translation.en: I much prefer the joy and solitude of good old Mother Nature.
translation.de: Ich bevorzuge die Freude und Ruhe der guten alten Mutter Natur.

translation.en: Not that it would be all smiles and meditation.
translation.de: Das heißt nicht nur Lächeln und Meditieren.

translation.en: Scaling this mountain is gonna take a lot of old-fashioned elbow grease.
translation.de: Diesen Berg hochzuklettern wird viel Anstrengung kosten.

translation.en: But I have faith that God is watching and he will reward our hard work.
translation.de: Aber Gott sieht zu und wird uns belohnen.

translation.en: And if it be his will,
Jaden and I will find that old whitetail we've been looking for.
translation.de: werden wir diesen Weißwedelhirsch finden, den wir suchen.

translation.en: If my calculations are correct,
our non-typical is on the other side of this hill.
translation.de: ist unser Außergewöhnlicher auf der anderen Seite.

translation.en: What if we get there and don't find anything?

translation.en: It will be there,
but if we're gonna make it, we can't be negative.
It'll be a hard climb. You wanna get that deer,
this is what we gotta do.
I gotta say, this deer really isn't a top priority for me anymore.
translation.de: Er hat für mich eigentlich keine Priorität mehr.

translation.en: Basically, I'm good if we don't kill the deer.
Ain't like it's gonna affect my life in some significant way.

translation.en: Of course it will.
The reason we're out here is so you can shoot a deer.

translation.en: How else are you gonna love hunting, huh?

translation.en: Oh, we're way past me loving hunting.
Why don't you go up there and kill the deer,

translation.en: -and I'll chill here? -You listen to me.
We are gonna finish this thing, okay?

translation.en: I don't care if I have to drag you up this mountain myself.
translation.de: Und wenn ich dich persönlich den Berg hochzerre.

translation.en: -Come on. -Please kill me now.
-Come on. Now. -Fine.
Jaden! Come on! Let's go!
[Buck] Beautiful!
Oh, Dad! Dad, look! Look.
Jaden, get your rifle ready. Come on.
Come on.
[exhales] I'll get to finish this video after all.
Don took the Sony, but this little deal is full 1080p,
translation.de: Don nahm die Sony, aber das Ding hier hat 1080p

translation.en: and will work in a pinch.
Oh, you look good in HD, Jaden.

translation.en: My Lord, that is one gorgeous non-typical whitetail. [exhales deeply]

translation.en: Right. This is the moment we've been waiting for, son. Are you ready?

translation.en: [Jaden] Oh, hell, yeah.
Now, remember, control your breathing.

translation.en: All right, when you're ready...
take the shot.
What's the matter? Is your gun jammed?
I'm gonna wait for it to turn around, get a cleaner shot that way.

translation.en: Oh, no, don't wait. Take him now.
I don't wanna injure him. Isn't that what you always say?

translation.de: Los, verletz ihn. Er hat Zeit auszubluten,

Trust me. Just take the damn shot already.
Okay, okay, relax.
Take the shot. Take the shot.
What are you looking at me for? Look at the deer!

translation.en: Take the shot. Come on, there you go.
[loudly] Take the shot!
Oh! No, he's running. Get him!
translation.de: Er rennt weg. Du kriegst ihn!

translation.en: He's running! Right over there! Get him! Shoot, Jaden!
Shit, it's Don! What the hell? You shot Don!
translation.de: Scheiße, es ist Don! Du hast Don angeschossen!

translation.en: -I gotta go out there and help him. -[gasps]
Jaden, no! No!
-[Don] Oh, I got popped in the leg. -Don?
Oh, Buck. Buck, is that you?
-I'm not doing good. -[Buck] I see you, buddy.
translation.de: -Es geht mir nicht gut. -Ich seh dich.

translation.en: Here we are, Don.
Put your head up a little bit.
-Here we are, buddy. -Oh, it's bad. It's bad.
I'll make a tourniquet. Hang in there.
translation.de: Ich binde es ab. Halte durch.

translation.en: You're a good shot, Jaden. You got me good.
translation.de: Das war ein sauberer Schuss, Jaden. Voll erwischt.

translation.en: Hang in there. What the hell were you doing up here?
translation.de: Halte durch. Was zum Teufel wolltest du hier?

translation.en: I couldn't leave till we finished that video.
Besides, who else knows which angles make you look younger?
translation.de: Wer sonst weiß, aus welchem Winkel du jünger wirkst?

translation.en: Ow! That's too tight! Put your finger inside of it.
translation.de: Das ist zu eng! Tu den Finger innen rein.

translation.en: We gotta stop the bleeding so we can get you out of here.
Put your finger on to make the wound stop mashing.
[Buck] Hang in there.
Don? Don. Come on, stay with me, Don.
Stay with me. Come on, buddy.
Is he dead?
Hey, Mom, you got that pretty dress on.
translation.de: Mom, du hast ein schönes Kleid an.

translation.en: We gotta get him out of here. Come on.
-Ready? Bring him up. -Yeah.
[grunts] There you go.
Don, ready? One, two, three.
translation.de: Don, bist du bereit? Eins, zwei, drei.

translation.en: [Buck] All right, come on.
[Don] Put me down. Put me down.
-Put me down. -[Buck] All right. Get him down.
Good night, my special son.
We're never gonna get Don out of these mountains.
translation.de: Wir kriegen Don nie raus aus diesen Bergen.

translation.en: Sorry, Dad. Sorry for shooting Don.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, Dad, dass ich auf Don geschossen habe.

translation.en: Oh, Jaden, it's not your fault.
translation.de: Jaden, es ist nicht deine Schuld.

translation.en: Yes, it is. I can't do anything without messing it up.
translation.de: Doch. Ich mache immer alles falsch.

translation.en: I failed at hunting just like I failed at school.
translation.de: Ich versage beim Jagen wie in der Schule.

translation.en: I don't need an extra year to grow and I'm not a visual learner.
translation.de: Ich brauch kein weiteres Jahr, ich bin kein visueller Lerner.

translation.en: What you all talking about? I'm bleeding... bleeding out.
translation.de: Was redet ihr da? Ich verblute.

translation.en: This just proves it.
I'm just not smart.
I'm stupid, Dad.
Don't you ever talk about yourself like that.
translation.de: Sprich nie mehr so von dir.

translation.en: I don't ever wanna hear those words come out of your mouth again.
translation.de: Ich will das nicht wieder hören.

translation.en: Y'all just keep talking, I'm bleeding.
[Buck] If there's anybody stupid here, it's me.
translation.de: Wenn hier einer dumm ist, dann ich.

translation.en: We should've turned back a long time ago.
I wanted you to kill that non-typical so bad,
translation.de: Ich wollte unbedingt, dass du den Außergewöhnlichen tötest.

translation.en: I didn't care what I had to do.
I thought if you loved hunting,
translation.de: Ich dachte, wenn du die Jagd liebst,

translation.en: it could be something we could do together,
'cause I'm not living with you anymore and I don't get to see you that much.
translation.de: weil ich nicht mehr bei dir lebe und dich nicht mehr so oft sehe.

translation.en: I was just hoping there would be a way that...
translation.de: Ich hoffte nur, es gäbe einen Weg, um...

translation.en: I could always be in your life.
But you don't need a reason to be in my life.
translation.de: Aber dafür brauchst du keinen Grund.

translation.en: You're my father.
What y'all doing over there? Having a sandwich?
translation.de: Was treibt ihr da drüben? Sandwich essen?

translation.en: [Buck] I don't know what to do.
Can't carry him out of here. Need a helicopter or a damn stretcher.
translation.de: Ich kann ihn nicht tragen. Wir brauchen einen Heli oder eine Bahre.

translation.en: How about an air mattress?
You, son...
are a damn genius.
Come on.
-[Buck] Oh, there we go. -[Don] Buck.
We got you.
Gonna hop on there, we start downstream.
translation.de: Es geht los, zurück nach unten.

translation.en: It's gonna be rough as hell. Okay?
Hold on to him and stay on this mattress best you can.
translation.de: Halt dich an ihm fest und bleib auf der Matratze.

translation.en: -You understand? -Don't worry, I got it.
You doing all right there, Don?
Good enough. Ready, son?
I was born ready.
All right. Don't get wet.
Let's go.
[Don] Oh, waterbed.
[Buck] Watch out. Paddle, paddle, paddle.
These rapids aren't so bad, maybe class two.
They're bad enough. Just be careful.
I've seen bigger waves in a toilet bowl.
translation.de: Ich sah schlimmere in einer Kloschüssel.

translation.en: Jaden, Jaden, Jaden, hold on. Yeah!
There we go. Hold on to the rope. Hold on to the rope.
translation.de: Also los. Halt dich am Seil fest.

translation.en: Now, these look like class three.
Making me faint.
What's happening?
You ready? Well, come on, let's go.
translation.de: Bist du bereit? Na los dann.

translation.en: [Buck] Hold on to the rope!
Doing good, son. Hold on tight!
translation.de: Du machst es prima. Gut festhalten!

translation.en: Hold on for a little bit longer!
-Brutal! -Hold on!
[Buck] We did good, son. We did good.
translation.de: Das ist noch mal gut gegangen.

translation.en: You're all right. You're all right.
-[Jaden] Are you okay, Don? -Yeah, I feel good.
translation.de: -Alles in Ordnung, Don? -Ja, es geht mir gut.

translation.en: I really appreciate this valiant effort to save me.
translation.de: Ich weiß diesen Versuch, mich zu retten, zu schätzen.

translation.en: Oh, this sounds like a biggie.
-All right, come on, paddle, paddle. -Let's just go to the shore.
[Buck] We can do this, son. Here we go.
-Oh, my God, here's the big one! -Oh, Jesus.
translation.de: Oh Gott, da kommt eine große!

translation.en: [Buck] Here we go! Hang on, Jaden!
Hold on to the rope!
Hold on!
-My rifle! -[Buck] No, Jaden!
Jaden, no!
Hold on, son!
Grab my hand! Grab my hand!
I got you. Hold on. I got you.
[Jaden] But my rifle.
[Buck] Let it go, son. Let it go.
Dad. I wanna play you a song I've been working on.
translation.de: Papa. Ich will dir ein Lied vorsingen.

translation.en: I'd love to hear it. You wrote a song?
translation.de: Sehr gern. Du hast ein Lied geschrieben?

translation.en: It's not perfect. Here it goes.
translation.de: Es ist nicht perfekt. Also los.

translation.en: ♪ In the mirror, in the mirror ♪
♪ It's my face I see ♪
♪ But it's my father's Yeah, my father's ♪
♪ Staring back at me ♪
Hold on. I'm gonna start over.
translation.de: Moment. Ich fang noch mal an.

translation.en: ♪ My father was a hunter ♪
♪ And I was his son ♪
♪ My father was a hunter ♪
♪ And I was his son ♪
♪ My father was a hunter ♪
♪ And I was his son ♪
♪ I was his son ♪
Where are we?
You're almost out of here, buddy.
Thank you for saving my life.
translation.de: Danke, dass du mir das Leben gerettet hast.

translation.en: You'd do the same for me.
The only reason I was gonna retire
was because I thought you didn't care about me.
translation.de: weil ich dachte, ich bin dir egal.

translation.en: I guess if you saved my life, you do.
translation.de: Ich denke, jetzt ist klar, so ist es nicht.

translation.en: I was wrong, Buck, when I said you were alone.
translation.de: Ich habe mich geirrt, als ich sagte, du seist allein.

translation.en: You're not alone. You always got old Don.
translation.de: Du bist nicht allein. Du hast immer den alten Don.

translation.en: -I know I do, buddy. -[chuckles]
All right, well, we only got one four-wheeler.
translation.de: Gut, wir haben nur ein Quad.

translation.en: Well, what am I supposed to do?
Sit here all alone in the woods, totally bored?
No, sir. I want you to take this four-wheeler,
translation.de: Nein. Fahr Don mit diesem Quad

translation.en: drive Don to Cherokee Mountain Outfitters and get him an ambulance,
translation.de: zum Cherokee Mountain Outfitters und ruf einen Krankenwagen,

translation.en: -but under one condition. -What?
You have to drive fast as hell.
translation.de: Fahr so schnell wie der Teufel.

translation.en: Good, 'cause that's how I do my best driving, anyway.
translation.de: Gut, so fahre ich sowieso am besten.

translation.en: Don't forget to send someone back to get me.
translation.de: Und schick jemanden, der mich holt.

translation.en: I won't forget you.
Bye, son.
